name: df-int
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wceq(cint(c0), cab(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
comment: Define the intersection of a class. Definition 7.35 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 44. For example, ` |^| { { 1 , 3 } , { 1 , 8 } } = { 1 } ` . Compare this with the intersection of two classes, ~ df-in . (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
